0.title: Farm CEO
0.description: Farm CEO is a farming simulator where you manage a farm. You are responsable for all of the management of the farm and must plant crops and fertilise paddocks accordingly to keep them alive.

1.title: Plaching
1.description: Plaching is a wedding photo app where people can view and upload photo's of a wedding.

2.title: Nebulous
2.description: Nebulous is a retro console system powered by a Raspberry Pi. Designed for both nostalgia and innovation, it offers a unique blend of custom hardware and software to deliver an exciting multiplayer gaming experience.

3.title: FS22 Topcon Tablet
3.description: This is a GPS for Farming Simulator 22 based of the Topcon Horizon monitors. It also has a custom autosteer that hooks into a G29.

4.title: cloc
4.description: cloc (Count LOC) is a terminal utility to easily count lines of code in a file / project.

5.title: Activity Bot
5.description: A Discord bot that tracks users time spent online in discord and their rich presence.

6.title: Whisper
6.description: A fully local, encrypted password manager.

7.title: Plazma Browser (Abandoned)
7.description: A simple web browser made in python using tkinter (and pygame) that should use minimum resources (Version 1 and 2).

8.title: Plat
8.description: Plat is a Discord like chat application made in collaboration with @something231 It has a global chat server so you talk with anyone as long as you have an account.

9.title: Eatventure Bot
9.description: A bot I made to automate playing the popular mobile game "Eatventure" using Python. My first project that I got a few people actively using.

10.title: Plazma.io
10.description: A Paper.io ripoff I made while learning Pygame.
